org.workflowsim.clustering.balancing.methods

Class BalancingMethod

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.workflowsim.clustering.balancing.methods.BalancingMethod
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ChildAwareHorizontalClustering, HorizontalImpactBalancing, HorizontalRandomClustering, HorizontalRuntimeBalancing, VerticalBalancing

    public class BalancingMethod
extends java.lang.Object
    BlancingMethod is the super class of all balancing methods
    Since:
    WorkflowSim Toolkit 1.0
